SocketGatherer - Class in it.polimi.se2018.server.network.socket
Class SocketGatherer : the class it's the real handler of the multiple connection of the client with the socket technology, and to do this task, the socket gatherer runs in a thread and every time receives a new connection, it's responsible for the creation of the virtual socket associated with it

Class constructor of the Gatherer in a specific port on a Server
SocketHandler - Class in it.polimi.se2018.client.network.socket
Class SocketHandler: represents the connection link between the client and the server, the socket handler is responsible to take the input the client provided to view and send it to the virtual socket (socket client implementation) across the network using the socket technology for the communication.
SocketHandler(String, int, View) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.client.network.socket.SocketHandler
Class constructor: create a new socket handler with an associated host (ip address) of the server to connect to, the port where socket has to be connected and a view
